name: Mediadores y Abogados LTD
goal:
Mediadores y Abogados LTD is a legal consultancy boutique. We deliver effective legal solutions, complemented by a comprehensive regulatory consultancy service focussing on providing critical in-depth advice on International Law, Human Rights, transparency, Mediation and European Law.

Our team of lawyers and experts has extensive and diverse industrial experience which equips us to deal with complex issues in a range of practice areas including International Law, Criminal Law, Taxes, company Law, contractual Law and mediation.

Our services are not restricted to Europe; we will assist our clients across the world.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: International Law, European Law, Company Law, Taxes, relations between governments and citizens etc.
